mapper.select: SELECT t1.material_name, t1.actual_ratio, t1.moudle_ratio, t1.deviation_ratio, t1.warning_level, t2.pro_name, DATE_FORMAT(t2.produce_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS produce_date, DATE_FORMAT(t2.produce_time, '%H:%i:%s') AS produce_time, t2.produce_ratio_id, t2.produce_car_num, t2.produce_disc_num, t2.produce_user, t2.produce_custom_num, t2.produce_crewNum FROM quality_warning_data AS t1 INNER JOIN ( ( SELECT QC.* FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew AS QC WHERE QC.produce_crewNum = 1 ORDER BY QC.id DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT QC.* FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew AS QC WHERE QC.produce_crewNum = 2 ORDER BY QC.id DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) AS t2 ON t1.crew_id = t2.id

( SELECT t1.pro_name, t1.repertory_one, t1.repertory_two, t1.repertory_three, t1.repertory_four, t1.repertory_five, t1.repertory_six, t1.breeze, t1.ratio_stone, t1.ratio_regenerate1, t1.ratio_additive, t1.regenerate, t1.additive, t1.ratio_regenerate2, 'crew1' AS 'crewNum', t2.* FROM quality_proportioning_message AS t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT produce_proportioning_num, produce_date, material_aggregate_1, material_aggregate_2, material_aggregate_3, material_aggregate_4, material_aggregate_5, material_aggregate_6, material_stone_1, material_stone_2, material_asphalt, material_regenerate, material_additive, temperature_warehouse_1, temperature_mixture, temperature_duster, temperature_asphalt, temperature_aggregate, material_total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data1 WHERE produce_proportioning_num = ( SELECT produce_ratio_id FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew WHERE produce_crewNum = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3 ) AS t2 ON t1.crew1_modele_id = t2.produce_proportioning_num WHERE YEAR (t1.create_time) = YEAR (t2.produce_date) ) UNION ALL ( SELECT t1.pro_name, t1.repertory_one, t1.repertory_two, t1.repertory_three, t1.repertory_four, t1.repertory_five, t1.repertory_six, t1.breeze, t1.ratio_stone, t1.ratio_regenerate1, t1.ratio_additive, t1.regenerate, t1.additive, t1.ratio_regenerate2, 'crew2' AS 'crewNum', t2.* FROM quality_proportioning_message AS t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT produce_proportioning_num, produce_date, material_aggregate_1, material_aggregate_2, material_aggregate_3, material_aggregate_4, material_aggregate_5, material_aggregate_6, material_stone_1, material_stone_2, material_asphalt, material_regenerate, material_additive, temperature_warehouse_1, temperature_mixture, temperature_duster, temperature_asphalt, temperature_aggregate, material_total FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_data2 WHERE produce_proportioning_num = ( SELECT produce_ratio_id FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew WHERE produce_crewNum = 2 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3 ) AS t2 ON t1.crew1_modele_id = t2.produce_proportioning_num WHERE YEAR (t1.create_time) = YEAR (t2.produce_date) )

SELECT t1.material_name, t2.produce_crewNum, TRUNCATE (AVG(t1.actual_ratio), 2) AS avg_real_ration FROM quality_warning_data AS t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT QC.* FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew AS QC WHERE QC.produce_crewNum = 1 AND QC.produce_ratio_id = ( SELECT produce_ratio_id FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew WHERE produce_crewNum = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY QC.id DESC LIMIT 3 ) AS t2 ON t1.crew_id = t2.id GROUP BY t1.material_name UNION ALL SELECT t1.material_name, t2.produce_crewNum, TRUNCATE (AVG(t1.actual_ratio), 2) FROM quality_warning_data AS t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT QC.* FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew AS QC WHERE QC.produce_crewNum = 2 AND QC.produce_ratio_id = ( SELECT produce_ratio_id FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew WHERE produce_crewNum = 2 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY QC.id DESC LIMIT 3 ) AS t2 ON t1.crew_id = t2.id GROUP BY t1.material_name

SELECT t1.material_name, t1.actual_ratio, t1.moudle_ratio, t1.deviation_ratio, t1.warning_level, t2.produce_crewNum, t2.produce_disc_num FROM quality_warning_data AS t1 INNER JOIN ( ( SELECT QC.* FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew AS QC WHERE QC.produce_crewNum = 1 ORDER BY QC.id DESC LIMIT 1 ) UNION ALL ( SELECT QC.* FROM quality_warning_promessage_crew AS QC WHERE QC.produce_crewNum = 2 ORDER BY QC.id DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) AS t2 ON t1.crew_id = t2.id
mapper.update: UPDATE quality_warning_level SET level_one_up = #{map.level_one_up}, level_one_down = #{map.level_one_down}, level_two_up = #{map.level_two_up}, level_two_down = #{map.level_two_down}, level_three_up = #{map.level_three_up}, level_three_down = #{map.level_three_down} WHERE id =#{map.id};
